thread.title: Valentine's Day dinners, sweets and things to do in Beijing
thread.title_full: Valentine's Day dinners, sweets and things to do in Beijing

title: Valentine's Day dinners, sweets and things to do in Beijing
text:
Valentine's Day dinners, sweets and things to do in Beijing By Jiang Wanjuan | chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2017-02-08 15:35 [Photo provided to chinadaily.com.cn] 
Four days' celebration at Hilton Beijing Wangfujing 
Valentine's Day is fast approaching and love is in the air. With Hilton Beijing Wangfujing's 4-day special dining options starting on Feb 11 at the hotel's three restaurants, Valentine's Day is no more you-miss-it-and-you-lose-it. 
The hotel's Chinese restaurant offers a 6-course set menu with free flow of Mumm Champagne at 888 yuan ($129) net per couple. 
The Western restaurant Flames Grill offers a fine dining 4-course set menu, including tuna ravioli and butter poached lobster with fillet mignon, at 1,520 yuan net per couple. The ultimate package, only two bookings available per day, includes a candlelight wine dinner at the hotel's private wine cellar and a one night stay with breakfast served on the next day. Please call 010-58128888 ext. 8411/8412/8417 for details.
